normalised: ## Control plus Alt plus Delete Tumchem I-T Bud'dhik Sthanik Dovrunk (Zaum Dita?)

unnormalised: Tor, tumi Information Technology-ant ek career korunk sodtat? Toyar ravat, pilgi. Tem "Silicon Valley" komi ani "Silicon Gully" chodd, khas korun tumi tem Bharotant kortat zalear. Ami eka vevsaayantlean uloytat zachem adhikrut nokriachem nanv "Troubleshooter," punn tumchem khorem kary "Electronic Demons-anchem Exorcist" lagim mellta.
normalised: Tor, tum Information Technology-ant ek career korcheak vichar kortat? Bottam kasun dhara, mogallancho. Hem "Silicon Valley" komi ani "Silicon Gully" chodd, khas korun tum tem Bharotant kortat zalear. Ami ek oxem profession-achem ulo kortat zantun tumchem official job title "Troubleshooter" asta, punn tumchem asli role "Exorcist of Electronic Demons" ani laginch asta.

unnormalised: Sat sangchem zalear, IT shetr Bharotant vaddon vellam. TCS thavn Infosys meren, sondhi ankhi nant. Punn tumi tumchea pyajamyant coding korpachem sopon dekhchem adim, ami kaim kathin satyacher dhyan dinvk zai. Poilem, 9 tem 5 visrun voch. 9 AM tem jednam server sahakar korunk tharta tem chodd chintat. Je lagbhog kednach na.
normalised: Sat sangonk zai zalear, I-T field Bharotant vaddoita. T-C-S thaun Infosys meren, chances anakar asat. Punn tum pajamasant coding korpak sopnant ravchea poilim, ami kiteak xarponn satyacho zata tem sangya. Poilem, nau thaun panch visarun vocha. Nau A-M thaun te server cooperate korunk decide korun zalear te meren vichar kara. Ani hem lagbhag kednach korina.

unnormalised: Mhaka mhozo poilo dis Wipro-nt ugddas asa. Tannim mhaka Windows XP (hoi, XP!) cholovpi laptop dillo ani mhaka "tik korunk" sanglem. Mhaka khatri asa ki tea laptopan caffeine break-am von chodd intern dekhle astole. Tem "BSOD" uloycher foddlean blue-screen zalem. RAM fokot 256 MB aslem! Mhaka khorench dislem ki ti ek thor marpachi vost aslee.
normalised: Mhaka Wipro-ntlem mhojem poilem dis ugddas asa. Tannim mhaka Windows X-P cholovpi ek laptop dilo (hoi, X-P!) ani mhaka to "sarki korunk" sanglo. Mhaka khobor asa tea laptop-an caffeine break-am poros chodd interns dekhle asat. Tum "B-S-O-D" mhonnchea poilim to blue-screen zata. R-A-M fokot donxe panchvis M-B aslem! Mhaka khorench dislem te ek prank aslem mhonn.

unnormalised: Ani tanntun acronyms asat. Oh, ti acronyms! Tumkam tumche soho-karyakarti samzunk ek decoder ring zai poddteli. Ami HTTP, DNS, VPN, RAM, ROM, SaaS, IaaS, PaaS, ani ek million dusrea je alien bhaxe bhaxen aikuk yeta tanche vixim uloytat. Khorench, mhaka kednaim-kednaim dislem ki hanv Alphabet Soup-ant fluent asa.
normalised: Ani uprant acronyms asat. Arey, te acronyms! Tumchea sangatiyalank somzonk tumak ek decoder ring zai poddttoli. Ami H-T-T-P, D-N-S, V-P-N, R-A-M, R-O-M, S-a-a-S, I-a-a-S, P-a-a-S ani ankui dusrim million utram zanchi zannvai alien bhasan bhaxa zata ulo kortat. Khorench, mhaka kednaim Alphabet Soup-an mhaka utram yetat oxem lagta.

unnormalised: Users-ancher mhaka start korunk naka. Tanchea kallzak bhogson, te karann kiteak ami lagim nokri asa. Punn tankam tem bhievnkhuy asa ki computer bond ani start korop litralli kitem-i problem solve kortolem. Ani te tumkam 3 AM-ak ulo kortele kiteak tanchem mashem keyboard-acher chollem ani atam sogllench network khalla aila. "Sir, tumi restart korun dekhlem?" "Beta, hanvem hea internetak duddu dileat!"
normalised: Users-ank ulo korunk zai naka. Tankam ashirvad asun, tankanch lagun amkam kamam asat. Punn tankam he sud'dha manyata asa ki computer band korun ani portun start korun kednachench problem solve zatat. Ani tankam tin A-M-ak phone yetolo kiteak tankanchi cat keyboard-acher cholli ani atam purnn network bandh asa. "Sir, tum re-start korun dekhlem?" "Beta, hanv internet-ak podde dilleat!"

unnormalised: Ani tanntun "urgent" request-ui asat. Sogllem "urgent" asa. Dor ek email-ak "high priority" flag kela. Dor ek problem ek "critical system failure" asa. Tori punn Mrs. Sharma-k ti tinnem tichea desktop-acher save keloli Bollywood dance playlist mellna tednam. Priorities, lokamno, priorities!
normalised: Uprant "urgent" requests asat. Soglle "urgent" asat. Dor ek email "high priority" dakhovta. Dor ek problem ek "critical system failure" asa. Mrs. Sharma-k tinnem save kel'li Bollywood dance playlist tichea desktop-acher mellonk na zalear sod'dha. Priorities, lok, priorities!

unnormalised: Ami system-amchim patching 2 AM-ak eka Saturdacho ulovisrunk zainam. Kiteak "weekend" mhanllear kitem-i na kodichi line-achi dekhnnuki sodn tumche ixtt bhair party kortat tednam. Fokot chai ani samosa toyar dovrunk ugddas dovrat. Tim Bharoti IT cholovnk dovortat tem petrol.
normalised: Shaniwarak don A-M-ak systems patch korpachem anand visarunk zaina. Kiteak "weekend" mhonnchench koddek pollovn ani tumchea ixttank bhair partying kortana dekhchench oxem asun di. Tea vellar chai ani samosas gheun dovrat. Te Bharoti I-T cholta tim fuel asat.

unnormalised: Ani internet speed? Tor, ami fokot itlench sangonk zai kiteak "lightning fast" mhanllear ek relative term asa. Tumi file download zavnk ek Zen- bhaxen utsavukay vikasit kartole. Tem tumchea atmik utsavukayichi parkxa mhanun chintat. Tem delayed gratification-achem jivitacho uzar mhanun vicharat.
normalised: Ani internet speeds? Tor, ami sodhi "lightning fast" ek relative utor asa. Files download zauncho kitem tori tum Zen-axen dovrunk xiktat. Tem tumchea spiritual endurance-acho test mhonn vichar kara. Tem delayed gratification-ant jivitacho lesson mhonn somza.

unnormalised: Punn hey, tem sogllem vaitt na. Tumkam sukhipadayok kopdde ghalunk melltta (komi-komi tea client meeting meren), tumi nitt novi vostu xiktat, ani tumkam tem sant'tpon melltta kiteak tumi digital jag cholovnk dovortat. Ani odhik, salary khub bore asat, khas korun tumi exchange rate-acho vichar kortat tednam tumi tumchem career videshant *prepone* korunk thartat zalear! Zait tumi tea nove Royal Enfield-ak melloun dovortele ji tumi dekhtat.
normalised: Punn arey, soglem vaitt na. Tumak sukhi kapdde ghalunk mellttat (tem client meeting asa tea meren), tum sadanch novim vostum xiktat, ani tum digital world cholovpi tum zatat mhonn tumak satisfaction melltta. Plus, tumchi salaries chodd bore asat, khas korun tum exchange rate-ant vichar kortat tumcho career abroadak prepone korunk decide kortat zalear! Zaunkoch tum ti novi Royal Enfield ghevunk favo zatat ji tum sodanch dekhleat.

unnormalised: Tor, tumi IT-ant bhitrun vetam, tumkam te club-ant yevkar asa. Fokot tumchem hasyeachem utsah, tumchi caffeine-chi uchchai, ani tumchi backup drive toyar dovrunk ugddas dovrat. Ani kednaim-kednaim, kednaim tumchea data-chem backup ghyat. Tumchem sant'tpon tachecher adharit asa. Shubhechha, ani tumcho code error-foddlean compile zavonk di! Zait IT deuta tumcher daye kartole ani tumkam tea Win XP machine-acher deal korunk poddchenam! Ugddas dovrat, Ctrl+Alt+Delete tumcho ixtt asa. Zory tem na zalear. Tor tumi tumchech bhashen asa.
normalised: Tor, tum I-T chea world-ak yetat zalear, tumchem swagat asa! Tumchem hasy sambhallun dovrat, tumchem caffeine levels unch dovrat, ani tumchi backup drive tayar dovrat. Ani sodanch, sodanch, sodanch tumchem data backup kara. Tumchi bud'dhik shantik to zai poddtta. Borem zaum, ani tumcho code error-free compile zaum! Zaum dita I-T deuv tumkam favo korun tumka tem Win X-P machine-ak deal korunk poddonk na! Ugddas dovra, Control plus Alt plus Delete tumcho boro ixtt asa. Zalear sud'dha tum tanchek asat.
